TEXT.TITLE: COPLEY PROPERTIES <COP> TO INVEST IN JOINT PACT
TEXT.BODY: Copley Properties Inc said the company will invest 9,500,000 dlrs in a joint venture to acquire and develop 33.4 acres of industrial land in Hayward, Calif. Copley said it will own 60 pct of the project and be entitled to a 10 pct preferential return on its investment plus 60 pct of all excess cash from operations, refinancings and other capital transactions. Reuter
